website_summaries.verdict: Great 3-in-1 option for joggers, women, and delivery professionals. Portable with a strong, wind-resistant stream.
pros: Contains all three popular forms of pepper spray
cons: May not include clip as shown

customer_reviews.title: Nasty stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I know this is pretty dumb and I do not advise it. Was drinking with my buddies one night and one of my army friends saw I had the pepper spray and procedded to say "You wasted you money that stuff wont do anything." And boy did I prove him wrong. We had an agreement that I could spray him. He was wheezing and couldnt see anything for a solid 10 minutes and he had most of his face covered besides his eyes and it was only a 1 second burst. He changed his views on it safe to say that. 🤣 highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Scotty B.

customer_reviews.title: HELP!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it really works very well. had to use it once while trying to unlock my car, someone bad tried to 'get me', but I was faster and sprayed him good. He could not move and claimed his eyes were blinded. In no time the mall police came and took him in.
customer_reviews.author: H. K.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Investment in Personal Safety!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Savre Red Pepper Spray for my wife to keep on her key ring. You can never be too safe, and the fact that she is a petite mom typically tending to two kids, made me purchase this for her safety. This was a replacement for the exact same Sabre model she's been carrying for the past few years. Im happy that she's never had to use it, and I'm even happier that before disposing of the old one I was able to test it and it still worked perfectly after many years! I rate this a perfect 5/5! Thank you for reading and rating my review!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon SteveTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it the device was fine. However I think around 2-3 weeks after purchasing the device started to leak. I thought maybe it would be a one time thing but upon inspecting it again, whenever you would switch the safety the area would always be wet. Also the safety clip doesn't really do a good job at securing because it would be flipped whenever I go into my bag to get my keys. A bit disappointed but it be like that sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: _emilon

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with white practice canister as described.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit specifically because it said it included a practice canister (the white canister). Instead I received 2 black spray canisters, both with labels that say "Sabre Defense Spray" and an expiration date (see photo). I'd rather have received exactly what was described so I could practice. I guess I can practice with the real canister but since I've never used one of these before it makes me nervous. Would prefer practicing with a water-filled canister first. Not worth the hassle to return.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Love

customer_reviews.title: Case No Longer Has a Belt Clip
customer_reviews.text: The spray itself is the same as I've carried for years while running. The case itself has changed. It's pictured with the belt clip on the back, but the product no longer has a belt clip.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmic_Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Thankfully I haven't had to use it as yet but ...
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully I haven't had to use it as yet but I feel safer knowing that I have it. I have a disabled teenager that I travel with and don't live in the safest neighborhood. This makes me feel a lot less vulnerable. I bought coil keyrings which I attached and wear on my wrist under my coat. This frees up my hand while still keeping my spray readily available if needed. I also bought for my daughter for added peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bell

customer_reviews.title: I haven't actually used it, but the "lock" is ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually used it, but the "lock" is not very secure. I carry this in my jacket pocket and there have been many times I've pulled it out to check on it and the lock is either halfway unlocked, or all the way unlocked. This is extremely dangerous, so I have to constantly check on whether it is locked.
customer_reviews.author: Deb_Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great and the practice one is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little set the fact that it comes with the water practice cannister is awesome. In fact I find myself recommending these to people telling them "no dont be afraid, get one with a water tester so you can practice". It is amazing how many people dont use pepper spray because they don't know how, and this little water can helps with that.
customer_reviews.author: M rux

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my daughter for Christmas and it started leaking less than three month later.
customer_reviews.author: Darin Moore

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed to look down at my keys and realize my pepper spray had fallen out of the canister. I was unable to locate the pepper spray. I was going to order another refill but I'm not sure where I put my canister that was holding the refill. I'm not too pleased about spending money for something that I no longer have because it had become detached without my knowledge
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: This can be employed before you need to use a lethal option. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This can be employed before you need to use a lethal option. Easy to use. The quick release key chain is great and works every time. I have purchased several of these to give away to important people in my life. This is a great option for those squeamish about carrying a firearm. The only way you are going to hurt someone with it is if you cram it down their throat. It can turn what was going to be the worst day of your life (or last) to a minor annoyance. Get one or several today.
customer_reviews.author: Motorcycle Nut

customer_reviews.title: Only needs one improvement.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't spray myself to see how well it works. I'm smart enough to take the word of those that did. I want a pepper spray as a first response for non-life threatening circumstances, possibly avoiding drawing my weapon. It needs a more pronounced area over the index finger to help prevent the finger from sliding up in front of the spray nozzle. I used JB Weld epoxy to build up a finger stop to show how it should be made. If you spray your finger, it's coming back in your face.
customer_reviews.author: JimM

customer_reviews.title: Not as described or pictured
customer_reviews.text: Item was not as described. I ordered a keychain pepper spray and received a regular pepper spray. Cannot return because of return policy. Now I’m stuck with the pepper spray that I won’t be able to carry on a keychain as I originally wanted. I also contacted the company and received no reply.
customer_reviews.author: GringaTica

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my girlfriend after a robbery had ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend after a robbery had her spooked and it gave her much needed peace of mind. Then much later, totally unrelated to the purchase, I snuck up on her to give a friendly little jump scare. Take my word for it that this works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, compact, easy to carry.
customer_reviews.text: I did not have any issue with the product and the “safety” always stayed in the locked position. I liked the key ring separator option (you can separate the can from the keys ahead of time when heading to your car). For me personally though, I did not like having to “slide to the side” the nozzle to unlock it. Seems like an extra step to try and remember when your brain is racing a million miles an hour already if you’re caught off guard in a questionable situation. I’ve opted to purchase a flip top safety cap canister elsewhere. Just a personal preference that I think ide do better with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily breakable
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure this product would work well against a predator... but I had it sitting in my jacket pocket and it somehow managed to completely come apart like this possibly by me bumping into something too hard. It’s super lightweight so I knew this would eventually happen. Now I can’t carry it around anymore because it unlocks on it’s own and LEAKS. It’s shattered on top so I can’t glue it back together. Wish the plastic was more durable because this would’ve been a disaster if a predator knocked me down and then the spray container broke.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: opens too easily can be dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I keep this in my pocket because I am a delivery driver and don't want to get robbed. So it often opens on accident in my pocket and will pepper spray my pocket. It doesn't hurt but I'll feel something slight. I think the packaging needs work because it shouldn't accidentally open. I haven't used it but it is in a convenient package and would be easy to use if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUST IN CASE....
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my two daughters as a Christmas present. They both loved it. One lives in D.C. and city life can be very dangerous. My other daughter owns a flower shop and sometimes leaves the shop late at night. This product gives a woman peace of mind, knowing that they have some type of protection. Neither one has used it yet and I pray they never have to, but it could be a valuable asset if something were to happen. It's always nice to be prepared...just in case. If you are a mother and have a daughter who lives alone or travels, I would urge you to buy this for them. You just never know.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Small and convienient
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these to protect us from the numerous loose dogs we encounter on our walks. Thankfully we have not had to activate one yet (2 weeks) and hope that we don't have too. I feel better having it on me though. The cartridge is small and fits easily in my coat pocket. I added the release tab to my purse. It is not easy to release though. You have to press a tiny button to get it off the key chain. I understood it to be a pull off and use item, it's not.
customer_reviews.author: Natural Expressions

customer_reviews.title: Very important to have
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold. Hight weight. But it to carry around with me but really sucks cause everywhere I went they made me take it back to my car :( so that kinda sucks. Good this is that I felt safe when I had it. Knotts doesn't let you take it in. Any office with detection will make u take it to your car. But if its just out in about around my house I was able to have it with me. I really enjoyed having it and made me feel safe
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Nicole Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately after owning this for a few years I had to use it.....this BARELY subdued the person long enough to allow me two seconds to jump in my car and speed away. If you need to use this be sure to keep spraying until you run out.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS !!!! There was nothing in there after ONE TIME test spray!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and tested it as described . I never used it for a year. I later started walking at night and was carrying it thinking I had some kind of protection. I decided to spray it to check it one night and there was nothing in it!!!! NOTHING!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Just want to feel safe!
customer_reviews.text: Just want to feel safe when going out into the world. We are living in a world where COVID is active and unfortunately, some people still go without a mask. I wear a mask to protect myself and those around me, but non-maskers are still prevalent in FL where people are running up and down without one. Well, I have the spray to give more defensive if they try sneezing or coughing in my direction.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Skopczynski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect self-defense for women
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my sister who lives alone and works late hours. She typically gets home at 4am and has had instances where she is followed/stalked by strange men. Her landlord was also living in the same complex and would get drunk and was always watching her. I sent this to her and instructed her to carry it ready at all times. It made her feel much safer, and gave me peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust this
customer_reviews.text: Empty! Bought two and the first time we tried one it didn’t work. Lucky to be here. One tiny poof and it was empty. Didn’t spray one foot. Luckily they heard our 911 call on their scanner app and left the scene. Don’t trust this anymore
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Butts

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have on my families key chains for safety...
customer_reviews.text: Safety is always a concern. Knowing that my family has the ADVANCED version of the Sabre pepper spray at their immediate disposal is important. And, having this with a keychain connector is key. I first bought another Sabre version without a keychain and they are basically useless for what we had intended them to be used for. Plus it's pink...so...everyone's happy!
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: Way to easy to unlock
customer_reviews.text: Seriously why is it SO easily to unlock. I saw this as a complaint but bought it anyway, thinking “like I doubt it’s as easy as ppl are saying. And isn’t that what I want” answer is no. Now I’m more afraid of it unlocking and going off than I am of a predator... to be fair while it unlocks SO easily I’m not sure how easy it is to press and not sure if it could “go on” on accident... being pepper spray o don’t want to try it out.,
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Matz

customer_reviews.title: Safety is not safe at all.
customer_reviews.text: The button slides to easily from the safety to the armed position. When it's in my pocket it may move and if I press against the trigger it will discharge in my pocket. I have to look for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Believer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to use it yet, thank goodness lol but it's definitely good to have. Very easy to carry around on your keychain, lightweight and easy to understand how to use. Convenient and makes you feel safer just knowing you have it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Model isn't as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this particular product to mount to my hydration backpack strap. I picked this product because it had a built in clip on the outside of the plastic case. The one I received looks like this one, but without the clip. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safety for College Student
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter attending college. Not a fan of pink, but she likes it and it is easy to see/find. Casing is of good quality and fits well in palm of hand. It does come with a key chain, but we are planning to put it on a lanyard to carry and loop on hand. Concerned keys might damage unit or cause discharge. Similar ingredients to Mace brand, but a bit cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: DonP.

customer_reviews.title: Good for self protection
customer_reviews.text: This pepper spray is very easy to hold and strippers for your fingers it's easy to use with a very good safety mechanism you have to turn it in order to get the pepper spray to come out I'm hoping when I ask for thickness how big it is very tiny can hold it in one hand because I have yet to spray it and I don't want that on my face
customer_reviews.author: Tarah

customer_reviews.title: I trust it enough to protect my mom
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit, my gf got one and I let her spray the inert stuff on me( to build mussle memerey). A fair warning there is due in the fake stuff that irritated my skin. But a great starting kit to practice distance limitations as well as build mussle memerey. The tear gas attacks the respotory sytem.( be aware you will receive some also, but not as much as the aggressor) try not to spray downwind it will comeback(just common sense but do what you have to do. I ordered this last set for my mom and trust this brand.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: In case of emergency
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this. My neighbor's pitbull was roaming free this morning. Needless to say, he is a big dog. He moved towards me, And when he did, he got a dose of my pepper spray. Bet he'll think twice about coming near me again. I was easy to spray. It came out in a full stream. It is on my keyring for easy accessibility.
customer_reviews.author: valban

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great, but...
customer_reviews.text: This product looks and feels great in your hand, it’s advertised that it sprays up to 10 feet, however I bought 2 and they spray 3 feet at best. They look great, but looks don’t really mean anything if you’re in a self defense situation. Luckily I tested this in my back yard before I actually needed it. Definitely won’t be buying any more of these.
customer_reviews.author: James L.

customer_reviews.title: Overall pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Overall pleased with this product. I do like the practice spray, and think it is a good tool for non lethal scenario training. Only 4 stars because I'm not thrilled about the safety lock. It doesn't stay in the locked position well at all. I have never had an accidental spray, but about every other time I take it out of my pocket, it has come off the safety tab, and is depressable. If there is going to be a safety on there, I'd prefer it works a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan c.

customer_reviews.title: Good for practice
customer_reviews.text: This is terrific and even better because of the practice sprayer. I do not know how well the actual pepper spray canister will fire, but the practice model is great because it allows you to get a better understanding of the how to use it. If you want to make sure you can respond appropriately in an emergency situation, it's good to practice before hand.
customer_reviews.author: C-Mad

customer_reviews.title: Need to have a stronger safety
customer_reviews.text: The keychain broke after only having it for a short period, but it doesn't hinder the spray so I am still happy with the product. I do wish there was a bit more "safety" on it, the clip moves very easily and I would hate to accidently spray myself while trying to open my car door or something... Wouldn't that be just fabulous. But, I love that it is pink and can attached to my key chain. Just the chance of accidently spraying myself has me keeping it in my purse and not using it on my keychain.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly “quick” release
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for the quick release feature, and it’s anything but quick. I assumed it would have a pull apart (with some force of course) connection, but you have to grab it, get your finger into a sliver of a groove, and push down on the groove to release it. Not good in an emergency situation or for one handed operation. The product itself functions well, and is easily grippable.
customer_reviews.author: Meri

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe! Lock does not lock
customer_reviews.text: This is very dangerous because the lock doesn’t click and it just sways back and worth. Very unsafe especially if left in purse and can easily be pushed around.
customer_reviews.author: katt

customer_reviews.title: love pepper spray! gave a bunch of these out as stuffing stockers
customer_reviews.text: love pepper spray! gave a bunch of these out as stuffing stockers. my bfs' sisters and his mom and aunt got one from me and they were kind of perplexed but I felt like buying a bunch of them if I bought myself one. you never know when something like this will come in handy and its better to have it before you need it. I would probably buy the pepper spray with the blue ink spray and the camera for the extra 10$ tbh but this was cheaper and the lesser of the two
customer_reviews.author: jetpackfr3sh

customer_reviews.title: Love It So Mucb!
customer_reviews.text: This spray is super easy to hold and easy to conceal. We did test it in an open field (not on anyone/anything) so that we knew exactly how to work it. It was super easy to use. I love the option to have it in fun colors! It’s the perfect size to add to your keychain.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Good to have.
customer_reviews.text: While although I haven’t had to actually use it, thank goodness, I appreciate the design. I practiced with the water filled canister and was amazed at the length of spray it packed. I like that it has a detachable clip for my keychain and the activation button is super simple. I don’t know how I’ll be if I encounter a situation where I have to use it, but I feel safer than without this in my posession.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy for running, recommended by others
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to grasp while running, hiking, etc. which I love. Fits in my small purse nicely. Wish it came with the red tab like others from this company has (on top) so it would be easier to visualize; I simply check that frequently by feeling it. My son recommended this brand and later I attended defensive training for women (local police) and they also recommended these ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: ClassicalEduMom

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomic flaw makes it unusable for me...
customer_reviews.text: The grips on the holder are not deep enough to provide any sensory feedback to confirm you are holding it correctly. As a result, I tend to pick up and hold the sprayer with my index finger covering the nozzle. I have zero confidence in my ability to grab/hold the canister correctly in a panic situation. I'll probably just spray my finger and it will get in face.
customer_reviews.author: Honest John

customer_reviews.title: You will feel safer!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I’m a retired law enforcement officer and I highly recommend this product. I have purchased one for each of my adult kids and grandkids. My husband also carries one in his truck. It’s easy to use and small enough to to put on your key chain. I even gave one to the female night cashier at our local Seven 11. Better safe than sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Karen J

customer_reviews.title: Feel More Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy to say that I have not had to actually use this product, however, I feel much safer knowing that I have it in my possession. It's compact and easy to carry without anyone really noticing it. I highly recommend this product if you often travel solo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sabre Red Maximum Strength 3 in 1 Defense Spray, it could save your life?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, just in case. She was looking for something that would snap in her purse and was easy to use. I had read reviews on this Sabre defense spray and decided to try it out. We received it and went over the instructions on how to use it, pretty simple. I figured if it can buy her some time if she was attacked that would be great. Having a little bit of protection is better than none at all. We will be looking into some further protection in the near future, but for now this product will due the job. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: microshredder

customer_reviews.title: She loved it! She really loved the sample spray for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister who had a stalker at her work. She loved it! She really loved the sample spray for practicing. The gel is great for windy days so that it doesn't blow back into your face. Her stalker has moved on but she keeps it close. I will be ordering one as well. Some times I am unable to carry my hand gun so this would be a great back up!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly3706

customer_reviews.title: Self Defense at its Finest
customer_reviews.text: Works great - as in, it sprays far and strong and seems to be quite potent. I dare not try it on myself even though I'm extremely tempted to. I bought two, one for my girlfriend and one for her mom. We all feel a lot better about everyone going out on their own now. Highly recommend - this has a bunch of sprays in it so that first test spray doesn't make you feel like you wasted half of it, it's quick and easy to get a hold of and spray correctly if needed, and it smells deadly so I'm sure it works great.
customer_reviews.author: kbrooks311

customer_reviews.title: Choose red for an additional security deterrent
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I picked red for my wife to make it easier for potential criminals to see it. It’s better if you don’t have to use it and they just think it’s not worth getting maced. The lock works okay, I wish it was more secure because she puts her keys + mace in her bag and that’s bag is expensive. The twist to unlock could be tighter. It shoots about 10-15ft in a narrow stream.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Ad was accurate
customer_reviews.text: Product came nicely wrapped. It was easy to hold and directions explained how it operates. I have not been mugged or attacked at this time so I have not used it yet. Will update this post if that happens to review how it worked and if I was able to get away.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi

customer_reviews.title: Best spray on the market
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I got this for my family. I have this spray already. My experience with this spray compared to the other sprays makes this my go to pepper spray. Good strong stream instead of a wide mist. The practice canister allows the carrier to aquatint themselves with the actions, aim, and limitations of the spray.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Discreet and nice size for hand. Know the name and reputation.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t specifically say if these will work as I’ve thankfully not had to use them. But I know the name and the product from past use so trusted it to buy again. I have one for myself and each of my college age children.
customer_reviews.author: Cheer Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cheap case breaks right away
customer_reviews.text: Case broke into pieces hanging from key chain. Left message for the vendor but they will not return the call. I’m a very disappointed decade long customer.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Willis

customer_reviews.title: Small and compact
customer_reviews.text: Spray container is small and compact. Luckily have not needed to use it. However, I have noticed on several occasions that while in my bag, the "trigger" tends to spin to the point of almost being off the "shelf" that prevents discharge.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Nice and small and you might appreciate its loop for ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small and you might appreciate its loop for holding it? I have it strapped to my black "dog stick" cane, with black duct-tape and it almost disappears. (Played with its key-chain piece and takes a wee bit of practice to release it.) Nice work, Sabre, THANKS! * Other needs & ideas? For my dog-stick, a secure pouch/carrier that maintains its direction, please? ;) (I have 2 sprayers attached with tape and a few bands, but there has to be a :better way?)
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: Seems ok, but also a little small and dainty.
customer_reviews.text: Got one for myself, mom and sister in law for Christmas. It's really small compared to others that I've had, weighs almost nothing and the trigger seems like it might break before ever needing to use it.. the instructions say you can do a practice spray, but it's so small I feel like I might should conserve what little is in there.. 🤷🏼‍♀️.. I guess I'll practice with mine on Cmas so we can see how well it actually works.. I'll update my review then.
customer_reviews.author: Chelcie

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter since she stays in classes well after dark. Don't know if it works well and I hope she never finds out.
customer_reviews.author: Golf Nut

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when changing canisters to avoid getting any actual pepper spray on yourself
customer_reviews.text: This come with a canister of pepper spray and a practice canister. Easy to grip. It has a (somewhat ineffective) safety switch. It wold be easy to accidentally spray some unintentionally in your bag.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great Oc spray
customer_reviews.text: Really great product to have in case it is needed. It’s small enough to carry in a small woman’s purse and to even have on your key chain. I would definitely recommend this to my fellow female friends as a way of protection if ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Shelf life less than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product looks good. However, advertised shelf life is four years, but the ones shipped to me expire in three and a half years. Since I hope to never have to use them, that cheats me out of six months of security.
customer_reviews.author: MVDH

customer_reviews.title: Hope it works!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had to use it. So I’m not sure if it works. But it has an easy release keychain clip! Haven’t noticed any leaks. It has however turned the safety off but I noticed it before it sprayed anything.
customer_reviews.author: mariah russell

customer_reviews.title: Wil start sprinkling liquid after 6 months of u using
customer_reviews.text: Kept it as bought for 6 months for u usage and then wanted to try to make sure it works that’s when realized it started sprain liquid like small liq and that’s it .
customer_reviews.author: Jayaraja Jayaraman

customer_reviews.title: Makes everything with eyes cry.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had to use it yet and hope I never will - but I know it works because a friend of mine’s kid got into her purse and sprayed her pepper spray, hotboxing us all in the car while in traffic. Lessons were learned.
customer_reviews.author: B A

customer_reviews.title: one for myself and one for my wife and they both were new in packing with an expiration date pretty far off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these; one for myself and one for my wife and they both were new in packing with an expiration date pretty far off. Quality is excellent for the QD key ring and the case. It fits comfortably in your hand with finger grooves and its easy to deploy. Having not had to use it I can't speak for its range/pressure/volume of spray but even having it gives you an added deterrent option for dealing with a dangerous encounter.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Nelson

customer_reviews.title: not used yet
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to use this bad boy. I'm sure it will be soon with all the losers who would rather steal than work.
customer_reviews.author: sah123

customer_reviews.title: Easy choice to make
customer_reviews.text: Lasted me forever until I was forced to throw away at an event. Very sturdy and I like how it has ink to identify your attacker. Luckily never had to use it but it’s been thrown around like crazy in my things and I can say it’s held up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: It helped me feel safe while traveling alone. I figured out how to use it easily. It has a great safety switch. So it doesn't get accidentally set off in my pocket or purse!
customer_reviews.author: Angi

customer_reviews.title: May accidentally spray! Not safe!
customer_reviews.text: The safety feature keeps turning to spray mode making it possible to spray on accident which is dangerous if you are driving and you bump it and it sprays, or any scenario where you did not purposely use it for your safety.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Sellington

customer_reviews.title: but it seems like it will be a decent spray
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully I have not had to use this yet, but it seems like it will be a decent spray. Three stars because it really needs to the lock to fit tighter. Several times I have looked at it and it is unlocked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold love the bright color
customer_reviews.text: Super bright pink! Love it haven’t used it yet but when I do I will be back to complete this review! So far I feel more confident walking down the street with this baby by my side.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: After a year, the lock started to "unlock" regularly. However, it still functions so far.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Leonard

customer_reviews.title: I love the little detachable keyring that comes with it
customer_reviews.text: I love the little detachable keyring that comes with it! My lanyard is heavy enough as it is, so it's great that I can detach it! Very convenient. I haven't had to use it yet, and hope I don't have to, but it certainly provides peace of mind! The lock function is great as well. But the detachable keychain is really what makes it for me. You don't want to have to be getting your lanyard all tangled up in your hair if someone is running at full speed to attack you. If that's up your alley though, the keychain is detachable. I see these around campus on other's lanyards sometimes as well, and they're sold at some stores!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Tseung

customer_reviews.title: Ready to rock n roll
customer_reviews.text: It gives me peace of mind to know I have some kind of self defense going on for myself with this. It’s easy to aim and has a safety lock on it that’s easy to remove for emergencies. I haven’t had the pleasure of using it in self defense yet but I’m confident it’ll do it’s job well.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Keychain is great, works.
customer_reviews.text: Cool how the pepper spray can pops off the keychain when you press the button. Makes it easy to attach and reattach. Keep it on my car keys. Tested on ground, spray is easy to deploy and control.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Its very easy and straightforward to use
customer_reviews.text: The spray canister was really helpful to learn how to use the pepper spray if ever I were to need to use it! Its very easy and straightforward to use. Love the keychain clip that allows you to easily remove the pepper spray from your keys for whatever reason. I like the option of being able to easily remove it if I do not need it with me and then slip it back in the clip when I do. Great product overall. The holder looks and feels like great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Edb63

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Pepper Spray!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the strength of this Pepper Spray. It is very strong and reaches about 6 feet away. It fits easily in my hand and is comfortable to hold. Its also not hard to use which I've found is the case with other Pepper Sprays I've had in the past. I love how the product is pink so I can easily find it in my purse if needed. The fact that this product has the 3 recommended ingredients also makes me feel safe carrying it around. I hope I never need to use this but if I do, I like knowing I have a very dependable Pepper Spray with me with me at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Livvy

customer_reviews.title: Safety latch broke after 3-4 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Safety latch broke after 3-4 months of normal use on keychain. The spray might have a 4 year shelf life but the case will let you down way before that. I have two, so will update if/when the other fails.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loose locking mechanism
customer_reviews.text: Fine otherwise, but I’m deducting 3 stars because the locking mechanism feels loose, which is REALLY important to not have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately, no one I have given this to have ...
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately, no one I have given this to have used this product. It is the perfect size for a purse, pocket... My daughter keeps it in her hand when she walks the dog or to her car. I did tell people I gave it to to try it out on a non windy day and to spray it briefly so they know it works and how to use it properly. Piece of mind purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Donna K. Fairfield-Green

customer_reviews.title: Spray away
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for a couple friends of mine. They haven’t used them so that’s a good sign. But they seem legit. I hope they are. I’d feel like a jerk otherwise...

customer_reviews.title: I was glad I had this with me when I was waking ...
customer_reviews.text: I was glad I had this with me when I was waking my dog, there were two dogs loose, pit bull mix, and I was terrified that they would get to my dog. one day it happened. One of the dogs came out of know where, and got very close and was right up against my dogs muzzle . I took out my pepper spray, good thing I did that, it saved my life
customer_reviews.author: Leona Galvacky

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I attached it to my key chain and it appears to be a little bit bigger than I thought. It takes about few weeks to arrive but it worth it. Just need some protection during these time.
customer_reviews.author: First-Class Media

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, hope we never have to use it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my girlfriend after we had a few incidents in her apartment building. I feel much better about her safety now that she keeps this on her key ring and next to her bed. She loves the look and feel, although the safety switch is a bit loose and I could see how it could easily misfire or at the same time be a pain when panicked and trying to use against an attacker. We haven't sprayed it yet to test as after reading some reviews the back fire or mist can still hit you we do not want to experience. But after reading the reviews I feel confidant that it will do as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: ooomphlaa

customer_reviews.title: Keeping it in your pocket
customer_reviews.text: This review is on portability and my experience carrying it in my pocket. I keep my keys in my front pocket with the pepper spray. The size of it isn't bad. Very portable. But just from walking around, it moves out of the safety position into the ready. So maybe a couple once or twice a day I have to put it in the safe position. It would be great if it had a little more tension or something to block it just a little more. I swear I may set it of when I grab my keys one day.
customer_reviews.author: woody619

customer_reviews.title: feel safer
customer_reviews.text: It came fast. I keep it in my purse and I like the small size. I cant say I have used it yet and I hope I don't have to but I do feel a bit better and safer that I have something to help me in case of emergency. I live alone so I keep my purse close by just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly79

customer_reviews.title: Small and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tested it (obviously), but it's very conveniently sized. I bought one for myself and my girlfriend. She keeps hers in her purse. I keep mine in a cellphone sized pouch on the front-left strap of my school backpack (since firearms and knives are prohibited at most college campuses). The "safety" has stayed in place despite being moved in and out of pouches and the packaging. This likely means no chance of accidental spraying. On another note, I can confirm that CS gas is very effective. This is based on US Army gas mask training (which I was unfortunate enough to have to run through three times!).
customer_reviews.author: TheGearGuy

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it does in the photos
customer_reviews.text: I like that the pepper spray looks exactly like it does in the photos in person. Thankfully I haven't had to use it yet! But I did test it out on the air to make sure it worked, and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mountains5201

customer_reviews.title: A necessity for living in the city
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my daughter. I have my own and it works to deter crazy people on the bus, the train and walking around on the streets at night. Just pull it out and be ready to use it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: T. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Is that a tear in your eye?
customer_reviews.text: We feel much more comfortable having these compact self-defense devices. Hope we never have to use these devices, but they are ready if we need them.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Seems great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife and she carries it regularly. Can't say we're one of those who has tried it ourselves, and she hasn't had to use it yet (thankfully) but from the looks of it, it's a sleek product! The only thing is she notices that in her purse sometimes the little safety switch gets pushed into the ready-to-fire position easily, but it hasn't gone off by itself. Hope to never have to use it, but good to have it on hand.
customer_reviews.author: ET2016

customer_reviews.title: SABRE 3-IN-1 Pepper Spray
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and effective. The practice canister is an amazing idea! It really helped my comfort level if I'm in a situation to use it. I walk every night and don't live in a stellar neighborhood. This pepper spray provides a level of comfort I didn't have before.
customer_reviews.author: Groovy 1

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, great added peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to hold and light to add to keychain. Stays locked very easily Haven't had any issues with accidentally unlocking or leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica N.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast. I have not tested this nor do I want to. It is light weight, although the locking mechanism seems to be a little too easy to turn. I have noticed with it in my purse that the notch will be moved to the point it is almost unlocked. I don't think my coworkers want to have pepper spray effects.
customer_reviews.author: Stix

customer_reviews.title: Good sense of security.
customer_reviews.text: I have to keep buying these because I forget to take it off before I go to places that have security (I.e. Disneyland, clubs, etc). It gives a good sense of security. 4 starts though because it is a bit on the bigger size and when I have it Attached to my keys, it hits my leg when I'm driving. Haven't had to use it yet, but I have tested it out on the floor to see how it sprays, and it works :)
customer_reviews.author: laura Deguchi

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: If this works as well as it says it does with the 25 one second bursts; it's a real keeper and must-have protection tool. I'm buying more for the cars and friends. Highly recommend. I haven't found another similar product that has pepper spray, tear gas, and tags the perp like this does.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Bought this spray and the problem we are having with it is that the safety latch keeps turning to the unlocked position. At one point we are going to spray our selfs with it by accident
customer_reviews.author: Colt

customer_reviews.title: I was Jipped
customer_reviews.text: My box came with a set of erasers in it. There was no Pepper spray
customer_reviews.author: Fred Dowdell Sr

product_meta.title: SABRE Advanced Pepper Spray Keychain with Quick Release – 3-in-1 Pepper Spray, CS Tear Gas & UV Dye – Maximum Strength Police OC Spray, Finger Grip for Better Aim – Optional Practice Spray
product_meta.description: Safety You Can Trust. Backed by more than 40 years of experience manufacturing pepper spray, SABRE is trusted by thousands of police departments and consumers worldwide. Family owned and operated for over four decades, our pepper spray is proudly manufactured in the U.S.A. and is ISO 9001:2015 certified.
feature_bullets: #1 PEPPER SPRAY BRAND TRUSTED BY POLICE & CONSUMERS WORLDWIDE: Including New York PD, Chicago PD & U. S. Marshals; RELIABLE & LONG-LASTING: 4-year shelf life from date of manufacture (2X the industry standard) for the best self-protection available

GUARANTEED MAXIMUM STRENGTH: Every SABRE pepper spray is backed by our exclusive in-house HPLC laboratory testing, ing maximum stopping power in every burst and eliminating the 30% failure rate experienced with other brands (U of Utah study)

MAXIMUM STOPPING POWER: SABRE ADVANCED 3-in-1 formula includes max strength pepper spray, CS tear gas for enhanced burning and UV marking dye to help ID suspect; Projects 10-Foot (3M) in powerful stream for protection at a safe distance

FASTER, EASIER, MORE ACCURATE AIM: Finger grip enhances your grasp and aim to help keep your eye on the threat; ½ oz container with 25 bursts (up to 5x other brands! ) protects against multiple threats; Includes Quick Release Key Ring for immediate access

STAY SABRE SAFE WITH FREE TRAINING: Feel confident and secure; In addition to your defensive spray, packaging includes links to free training videos and safety tips to help maximize your personal safety when in the face of danger; Made in the USA

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
